job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>DevOps style SREs with the skills listed below<br><br>Distributed systems knowledge like Hadoop/HBase, Kafka etc<br><ul><li>Average coder in Java.</li><li>Python + Shell scripting knowledge is a plus.</li><li>Production maintenance experience.</li><li>Basic Kubernetes knowledge.</li><li>Telemetry domain knowledge is huge plus.</li><li> Hubble expertise<br></li></ul><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Production maintenance and on-call.</li><li>Debug and fix Java code. </li><li>Help customer support team in answering few complicated user questions.</li><li>Improve automation and tooling.</li></ul>
